name: Miodrag Đurić
caption: Miodrag Đurić (Dado) in the early 1970s
summary: Miodrag Đurić (1933–2010), known as Dado, was a Yugoslavian-born artist who spent most of his life and creative career in France. He is particularly known as a painter but was also active as an engraver, draftsman, book illustrator and sculptor.
